newsitem.title: USA: Good Guys Q4 same store sales fall.
newsitem.headline: Good Guys Q4 same store sales fall.

text.p: Good Guys Inc said total sales for the fourth quarter ended September 30, 1996 were $212.0 million, down from $213.5 million in the year-ago fourth quarter. It said same store sales in the quarter fell 10 percent.
For the fiscal year ended September 30, it said sales rose four percent to $925.7 million, and same store sales fell eight percent.
During the quarter, the company opened one store in Oregon and relocated its San Jose, Calif., store to a larger site.
